name: Kingsblade: King's Keep Prologue
description:
Kingsblade: Next-Gen Escape's mobile hack 'n slash platformer! Leap across peril! Deal with dastardly rats! Break the bones of skeletons! Save the Princess!

(This indirect prologue to Next-Gen Escape's King's Keep Escape Room is spoilers-free and adds to the story behind the escape room. It is not necessary to play King's Keep to enjoy this game.)

In Kingsblade, players take on the titular role and try to save Princess Ariana from the foul dungeon beneath the capital city. You'll encounter vicious rats, and toiling skeleton guards as you venture further in the dungeon... And find a most dangerous foe in the bottom chamber...

Jump over danger and slash at your foes! You are the Kingsblade!
